sentences.sContent: Her honeymoon seemed a distant memory .
sentences.sCn: 她的蜜月似乎成了遥远的记忆。

sentences.sContent: That affair was in the dim and distant past (= a long time ago ) .
sentences.sCn: 那件事已成为遥远的过去了。

sentences.sContent: The President hopes to visit Ireland in the not too distant future (= quite soon ) .
sentences.sCn: 总统希望在不久的将来访问爱尔兰。

trans.tranCn: 遥远的；冷漠的；远隔的；不友好的，冷淡的
trans.tranOther: far away in space or time
